publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3506 Adam Ingram: Education (Additional Support for Learning) (Scotland) Bill—That the Parliament agrees to the general principles of the Education (Additional Support for Learning) (Scotland) Bill. Supported by: Fiona Hyslop*
